snippet: There’s a new strategy afoot at the company, which has brought apps and services to the Apple and Android devices people actually use, rather than ones that run Windows.
abstract: Machine Learning column examines new strategy on part of Microsoft to have bigger footprint in mobile market, which includes bringing its apps and services to Apple and Android devices; praises Microsoft's mobile offerings, particularly way they seem to reflect company's commitment to its new strategy.
lead_paragraph: There’s a new strategy afoot at the company, which has brought apps and services to the Apple and Android devices people actually use, rather than ones that run Windows.

headline.print_headline: Microsoft Has Suddenly Gotten Serious With Mobile
